Html:
I need to develop a quick application to interact with excel. I have a brief look at the examples but could not see how to.
  1. select a spreadsheet page (tab)
  2. Find a value in a column on a page.
Would love some direction on where to find an example or what I use to do the above tasks.

Outline of the task I have to do.

Open an existing spreadsheet.
Find a value in a column on a page (tab)
Update/add a value to a column in the same row.
When completed save sheet.

Many thanks for any replys.

Just do it. (i'm sorry to all the lawyers from Nike here)

Workbooks.Open - to open the excel file
Workbooks.Sheets[x] - to select your target sheet
Rangle.Find - to find the target cell of your value
Range/Cell Value - to set your value
Workbook.Save - to save the changes

Done in a minute! i can give you a code snippet if you need it anyway.

Sebastian
